documents.document: @Bibliocook oh! Only see this now, hope you found a chilled place & had a good night! 😊
@VineInspiration yip these two are thirst-quenching alright! 😊

@BaggotStWines @NOffLA @Joelfinebottles massive congrats guys! Well deserved!

Love it! #Pierre&CatherineBreton #VinNature https://t.co/5tD3VtOKWv
@lecaveau2 @colmmccan @ClaireOBoyleG @ger98765 @Magsmurf great day for a meeting & looking forward to 2017! Lovely lunch @Zuni_Kilkenny too!

@ClaireOBoyleG @EttoMerrionRow many thanks for the RT 😊 Hope all is well!
New position available for a fab sales person based in Dublin to work with the fab @ClaireOBoyleG and with Le Caveau team #jobfairy

@Nash19Cork really enjoyed meeting the whole team, many thanks for having me 😊

@GreenManWines1 whoa! That's a BIG one! Can't wait for this evening! 😉
@Latitude_51 @lecaveau2 super line up! #BeaujolaisNouveau #VinNature 👍 have a great tasting this evening!
@kopwas yeah they are miles away from the confected, bubblegum/banana flavoured, mass produced Nouveaux - these are pure Gamay juice! 😉
@bradleys_offlic @DiscoverBojo @Wilsononwine @LesliesWineFood such a chilled label!
@PembrokeWinesIE @Terroirsdublin @BaggotStWines Good morning - head is clear, ready for #BeaujolaisNouveau day (& night!) 😉

@NomadWine oh yeah, great match! #Charcuteries & #nouveau

@Declans_Offie @colmmccan @DooleysHotel @SolasCentre was just preparing the wines! Can't wait - Always a great night!

@LMulliganGrocer @eatdrinktravels @ShaneDigsWine #BeaujolaisNouveau the artisan way - Not to be missed!
@MaryDowey so nice to see you Mary, delighted you enjoyed it - heavenly food and unique atmosphere @cliffhousehotel is a very special place!
